content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [StandardizedBank].[ProcedureAccount] @ETL_DATE [INT] AS
BEGIN

TRUNCATE TABLE [Standardized].[H_ACCOUNT];

INSERT INTO [Standardized].[H_ACCOUNT] 
([Account HashKey]
,[Account Number]
,[Record Source]
,[Load Date])
SELECT 
Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('ACCOUNT' + '-' + ID + '-' + CONTRACT_NUMBER) AS [Account HashKey]
,ID + '-' + CONTRACT_NUMBER AS [Account Number]
,'LandingBank.Card' AS [Record Source]
,CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]
FROM [LandingBank].[Card] 
WHERE AMND_STATE='A' AND CON_CAT='A' 
AND CONTRACT_NUMBER NOT LIKE '%-L-%'
AND DATA_DATE=@ETL_DATE
;

END


-------
GO
